JOB DESCRIPTION: Design, Develop, implement and maintain Java application software. To take part in software and architectural development activities. To work on Image processing and DiCOM images.       Responsibilities      Delivering a complete Java based image processing application     Ensuring high performance on mobile and desktop     Writing tested, and documented code     Creating self-contained, reusable, and testable modules     Validating user actions on the client side and providing responsive feedback       Skills and Qualifications      Candidate should have at least 1 year of experience in JAVA     Must have worked on Image Processing Matlab/Python/Java      Relational Databases, SQL and ORM      Good to have experience working with Object Oriented Analysis and Design
